question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. gloves
B. gray bag
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The 2D image makes it ambiguous whether the gloves (on the motorcycle handlebars) or the gray bag (carried by a person in the background) is closer, as depth cues are weak and the bag is partially occluded by the person.
